casebody.data:
No. 10-11262. Gerry W. Fowler, Sr., Petitioner v. Timothy F. Geithner, Secretary of the Treasury. 565 U.S. 1058, 132 S. Ct. 756,

181 L. Ed. 2d 482,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8621, November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 417 Fed. Appx. 279.
